name: Ooby the GhostLord
description:
Help Oobi to defeat the ghosts! This is a vertical slice of the full game and will be further developed based on demand. 

Awander develops and releases monthly games. He is currently running full-time on caffeine, so feel free to donate and buy him some coffee! (doing so will make him work forever and release better games)   

Also, check out sweet devlogs here: 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_LkLqYVA2PognHA-hRy5kg
